about-view.using-app: From the Hupp team for using this app!
about-view.mission: We are a startup based in Nice that wants to make daily transportation simpler, more efficient and friendly.
about-view.hupp-description: Our other app, Hupp, is a daily travel assistant for your daily carpooling.
about-view.try-it: If you too want to get rid of traffic jams, try it!
about-view.contact: If you want to tell us something, please write to as at
